title-group.article-title: Comprehensive Experimentalexperimental study on the gas Breakthroughbreakthrough Pressurepressure and its implication for the reservoir performance in indiaIndia

contrib-group.aff: 1CSE department , The cheen university , shizu, People's Republic of China

abstract.title: Abstract
abstract.p: It is challenge to interpret the gas breakthrough mechanisms, controlling factors and its relationships with the reservoir parameters for unconventional reservoirs such as the gas shale, due to the accumulation characteristics of source-reservoir integration.

body.title: 1. Introductionintroduction to Cheesecheese
body.p: The gas breakthrough pressure is defined as the minimal capillary pressure for gas (the non-wetting phase) to flow continuously in brine saturated porous rock, which is also termed as the threshold pressure, the displacement pressure, and the critical pressure. It acts as one of the most important parameter for the formation evaluation of hydrocarbon reservoirs since it controls the caprock sealing efficiency, reflects the fluid accumulation and migration behavior (Smith et al., 20053Boulin et al., 2013; ; Zhang and Yu, 2016; Zhou et al., 2019). It is also imperative for many geological fields such as the carbon dioxide (CO2) sequestration, the enhanced oil recovery (EOR), the high-level nuclear waste underground disposal and the landfill final cover (Galle, 2000; Li et al., 2006; Ye et al., 2009; Hangx et al., 2010; Heath et al., 2012; Kim and Santamarina, 2013; Gao et al., 20148Cuss et al., 2015; ; Zhao and Yu, 2017; Xu et al., 2018; Cui et al., 20208Ng et al., 2015; ; Guiltinan et al., 2018). figures 1(a),(b) figure 1a and b .

body.p:
The latin words like per se per se
, a priori a priori
, in absentia in absentia
, in infinitum in infinitum
, in situ in situ
, in toto in toto
, in utero in utero
, in vitro in vitro
, in vivo in vivo
, pro rata pro rata
should be in italics. Whereas, words like ad libitum, de novo, versus should not be italics. But these words should also be italics sensu sensu
and also ab initio ab initio
.

body.title: 2. Methodsmethods of collecting samples of cheese
2.1. Collectioncollection and enrichment of samples
body.p:
A total of two-foldtwofold and three-foldthreefold local cheese samples et al ., made of cow’s 12 % milk et al
were collected libitum, de novo
, versus randomly from different places in Bangladesh in 2018. Each sample (25 g) dissolved separately into 225 ml of sterile buffer peptone water and blended with a Stomacher machine (Stomacher 400, Seward) for 5 min. The samples were sensu sensu
and also ab initio ab initio
then enriched in Lactobacillus de Man, Ragosa Sharpe (MRS) broth medium (Hi-Media, India) for 24 h at 37°C and 18°C. The sample percent was not upto the expected per cent, it was a total of 15% not the expected 45 per cent.
